events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit at all and I want to return it for a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized as a Refund case based on their return and refund inquiry.
A customer service agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Sorry to hear the jacket didn't fit. I'd be happy to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is still in its original packaging and has not been worn.
Thanks for the info. You can send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once we receive it, we'll process your refund promptly.
That sounds good, thank you for your help. I will package it and send it out today using the label.
Your return label has been emailed to you. Once we get the jacket, the refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today in full. Thank you very much for the smooth process and assistance!
The refund case has been closed successfully after confirming the customer received their money back.
